t_instrument_upload_history.id, ins_ulhist_id, t_instrument_upload_history.u_uid, t_instrument_upload_history.org_oid, t_org_base_info.org_name,t_user_base_info.u_mobile,t_user_base_info.u_nickname, t_instrument_upload_history.create_time, t_instrument_upload_history.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from rlab_instrument_info.t_instrument_upload_history JOIN rlab_org_info.t_org_base_info ON t_instrument_upload_history.org_oid = t_org_base_info.org_oid JOIN rlab_user_info.t_user_base_info ON t_instrument_upload_history.u_uid = t_user_base_info.u_uid ORDER BY t_instrument_upload_history.create_time DESC

mapper.update:
update rlab_instrument_info.t_instrument_upload_history
ins_ulhist_id = #{insUlhistId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
u_uid = #{uUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
org_oid = #{orgOid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
